targets.query: SELECT percentile("request_time" * 1000, 95) FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("request_time" * 1000, 95) FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("request_time" * 1000, 95) FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("request_time" * 1000, 95) FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("resp_bytes") FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "resp_code" fill(null) SLIMIT 10
SELECT sum("resp_bytes")  * 1s / $__interval FROM "nginx_access_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "resp_code" =~ /^2/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "nginx" WITH KEY = "host"
